column3: Traffic;Sihanoukville: ------An ambulance of Sihanoukville Referral Hospital hit a man on a motorcycle on July 27
column4: 2019 at 22:30 PM on National Highway  4 in front of the Caltex station in 1 Sangkat No.1 City / Sihanoukville Province.------ Police said that the accident was caused by a the TOYOTA
column5: number plate 12 (2-0336) of Preah Sihanouk Referral Hospital
column6: with unidentified driver from Phnom Penh.------ Eang Sokheng
column14: was riding in the opposite direction and died at the scene.------According to the source the driver escaped after the accident
column15: while  the vehicle and motorbike were taken to the traffic police station. ------https://www.swiftnewsdaily.com/articles/369891
